src:
FOTO: Quartararo Menggila dan Pole di MotoGP Malaysia
02 Nov 2019, 20:02 by AP, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia
Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Fabio Quartararo tampil menggila dan menjadi pebalap tercepat pada kualifikasi MotoGP Malaysia di Sirkuit Sepang, Sabtu (2/11).


Fabio Quartararo menjadi pebalap tecepat pada kualifikasi MotoGP Malaysia di Sirkuit Sepang, Sabtu (2/11) dengan catatan waktu 1 menit 58,303 detik. (AP Photo/Vincent Phoon)



Maverick Vinales dari Yamaha sempat berada di posisi tercepat pada kualifikasi . (AP Photo/Vincent Phoon)



Setelah Maverick Vinales, Franco Morbidelli juga sempat berada di posisi terdepan pada kualifikasi MotoGOP Malaysia. (AP Photo/Vincent Phoon)



Fabio Quartararo berhasil meraih pole position pada menit akhir kualifikasi. (AP Photo/Vincent Phoon)



Aksi Fabio Quartararo usai meraih pole position. Posisi kedua ditempati Vinales dan ketiga ditempati Morbidelli. Morbidelli sempat menyebut Marquez sebagai pebalap gila. (AP Photo/FL Wong)



Valentino Rossi merasa puas berada di urutan start keenam. Sementara rivalnya, Marc Marquez, berada di posisi 11 setelah mengalami kecelakaan di Tikungan 2. (AP Photo/FL Wong)



Maverick Vinales semringah meraih posisi start kedua di MotoGP Malaysia. (AP Photo/Vincent Thian)



Pebalap HondaÂ Jorge Lorenzo sempat mengalami kecelakaan pada latihan bebas keempat sebelum kualifikasi MotoGP Malaysia. (AP Photo/FL Wong)
text:
Selection of the Russian ruble as the best currency in 2019

The Russian ruble was named the best currency of the developing world this year.
02 Nov 2019, 20:52 by Bulletin News | bultannews.com
In an article, the German weekly Focus focused on the ruble (the Russian currency) as the best currency in the developing world this year, according to Sputnik.
In recent years, the Russian currency has been heavily affected by economic and foreign policy problems, including anti-Russian sanctions and falling oil prices. However, the Russian ruble overcame all of these problems and was responsive to political changes and world market fluctuations.
At the same time, the financial situation in Russia has significantly improved and the ruble has risen against the dollar and the euro, making the ruble one of the most powerful currencies in emerging economies this year, the source said.
